events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred on the highway involving another vehicle at midday.
After reviewing the initial report, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident for further processing.
An insurance agent was assigned to the claim to assist with documentation and customer communication.
A formal acknowledgment email was sent to the claimant confirming the receipt of the auto accident claim.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical reports from the claimant to support the claim.
Claimant submitted all requested documents including police report and vehicle inspection photos.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted involved parties for statements.
The investigation into the auto collision details was completed successfully without any discrepancies.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering repair costs and medical expenses related to the accident.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the promptness and fairness of the proposed settlement agreement.
Insurance claim was formally approved based on investigation results and customer agreement to settlement.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount was processed and transferred to the claimant's account.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following payment and confirmation of no further issues.
All claim records and related documentation were archived securely for future reference.
